text: Tamola is an unincorporated community in Kemper County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== Tamola is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "to scatter". A variant name is "Tamola Station". ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Kemper County, Mississippi
title: Tamola, Mississippi
